item.title: Anything You Want Review
item.description: I don’t know why I keep reading books about entrepreneurship. I like the idea of building a business, having passion for something, and most importantly, living life on your own terms. I just don’t think I’m cut out for it. But see if that will stop me from devouring Hacker News, startup podcasts and books like Derek Sivers’ Anything You Want. Derek was a musician who started selling his own CDs online in the days before Paypal.
